name: Inputs (for cross-validation, only use 'Training Data'):
description: To perform cross-validation, only provide the data and class files in 'Training Data.' Otherwise, for test-train prediction, provide inputs in both 'Training Data' and 'Testing Data.'

name: Inputs (for cross-validation, only use 'Training Data'):/Training Data
description: Provide data (feature) and class (target) files for training dataset (required)

name: Inputs (for cross-validation, only use 'Training Data'):/Testing Data
description: Provide data (feature) and class (target) files for test dataset (only needed for test-train prediction, not cross-validation).

name: Inputs (for cross-validation, only use 'Training Data'):/Prediction Result
description: Provide prediction results filename. Default is to use training data base filename.

name: Optional Classifier Parameters:
description: The following parameters for classifier specifications are optional as default values are passed in. For details, please refer to this
